channel.title: Need some help :)
channel.description: Ok, I have been waiting for someone to get on for 2 days now. He is helping with my server and he said that we can use his source. I have been waiting for this source for 2 days now and he hasn't been on. He is the one out of us 2 that is experienced in the forum junk. And he knows what to buy for the server and what not to. So, I am looking for someone to talk to me on msn right now and possibly teach me some things cause I am really bored. I need to know what is the best forum to use, what all should I buy to have a successful server, and what not to do that will make my server a fail. I also need to know a good source to use, what base should I use, and if you have an msn, please tell me it. If any of you know a good free forum to use and a cheap domain I can get please tell me, and if you are experienced in making a forum please try to teach me the basics of it. Thanks alot everyone, please feel free to comment even if it isn't really helping. If you are going to help PLEASE leave your msn.

item.title: Need some help :)
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:403706”][quote author=Vexillum link=topic=500770.msg3663045#msg3663045 date=1310450149]
Ok, I have been waiting for someone to get on for 2 days now. He is helping with my server and he said that we can use his source. I have been waiting for this source for 2 days now and he hasn’t been on. He is the one out of us 2 that is experienced in the forum junk. And he knows what to buy for the server and what not to. So, I am looking for someone to talk to me on msn right now and possibly teach me some things cause I am really bored. I need to know what is the best forum to use, what all should I buy to have a successful server, and what not to do that will make my server a fail. I also need to know a good source to use, what base should I use, and if you have an msn, please tell me it. If any of you know a good free forum to use and a cheap domain I can get please tell me, and if you are experienced in making a forum please try to teach me the basics of it. Thanks alot everyone, please feel free to comment even if it isn’t really helping. If you are going to help PLEASE leave your msn.
[/quote]

  1. Obvious troll is obvious
  2. SMF
  3. No-IP
  4. Hyperion
  5. The game.[/quote]

It wasn’t really a troll, he was a great coder, good helper… Probably just can’t get on atm. Probably will use SMF. I have No-IP. I’m interested in PI atm, need to know a good PI source (Should have included that). What is the game?

Read full topic
